info.name: autohide the menu & sidebar [CBS Local]
info.description: The header at the top of the page is collapsed to a thin horizontal strip and pinned to the top of the window, the sidebar on the right side of the page is collapsed to a thin vertical strip and pinned to the left edge of the window, and the footer at the bottom of the page is collapsed to a thin horizontal strip at the bottom of the page. Hover over any one of them to expand them again and display them on top of the page content.
info.additionalInfo: Comments are suppressed because they're usually inflammatory and rarely useful or entertaining, and because it was too much trouble to add CSS to auto-hide them. Delete the styles under "no comment" to restore them, if you like. N.B.: I use AdBlock Plus. If this page looks busier in your browser than in the screenshot, that's probably why.
